name: Rolls & Trolls
description:
A dungeon-crawler/puzzle game where you are the die (D6, to be exact).
Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022.
If you wished it was longer, me too! But mid-jam burnout happens... I hope to finish this game someday, but for now enjoy this proof-of-concept.

Game was made by me, with assets from Kenney, using Godot Engine and LDtk.
